import React, { useEffect, useState, useContext } from 'react' import Head from 'next/head' import { publicFetch } from '../../../util/fetcher' import { GroupAuthContext } from '../../../store/groupauth' import Layout from '../../../components/layout' import PageTitle from '../../../components/page-title' import WaitList from '../../../components/admingroup-form/waitlist' import styles from './stylesadmingroup.module.css' const AdminGroup = () => { const { valueGroup, setValueGroup } = useContext(GroupAuthContext) const [valueBool, setValuebool] = useState(false) const toggle = () => { setValuebool((prevState) => !prevState) } return ( Create group
{valueBool ? ( ) : (

{valueGroup}

)}
) } export default AdminGroup
